mapper.select: select cs.cs_stat from member mem left outer join commute com on mem.m_id=com.m_id join bus on bus.B_vehiclenum = mem.B_VEHICLENUM left outer join cstart cs on cs.cs_code=com.cs_code where mem.m_name=#{m_name} order by com.c_date

select nvl(cs.cs_stat,' ') from member mem left outer join commute com on mem.m_id=com.m_id join bus on bus.B_vehiclenum = mem.B_VEHICLENUM left outer join cstart cs on cs.cs_code=com.cs_code where mem.m_name=#{param1} and bus.r_num=#{param2} order by com.c_date
select distinct mem.m_name from member mem join bus on mem.b_vehiclenum=bus.b_vehiclenum left outer join commute com on com.m_id=mem.m_id
select distinct mem.m_name from member mem join bus on mem.b_vehiclenum=bus.b_vehiclenum left outer join commute com on com.m_id=mem.m_id where r_num=#{r_num}
